statements: SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, participant_id, rating FROM conflict_resolution_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_description FROM conflict_resolution_feedback WHERE participant_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_id, rating FROM conflict_resolution_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT feedback_description, rating FROM conflict_resolution_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_feedback WHERE participant_id = 1 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_description, rating FROM conflict_resolution_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, participant_id, feedback_description FROM conflict_resolution_feedback WHERE participant_id = 2 AND rating < 3 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT participant_id, feedback_description, rating FROM conflict_resolution_feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT feedback_id, participant_id, feedback_description, rating FROM conflict_resolution_feedback ORDER BY participant_id, rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Participants;
SELECT participant_name FROM Participants ORDER BY participant_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM Feedback WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM Participants WHERE participant_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE rating >= 3 ORDER BY participant_id, feedback_id DESC;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM Participants WHERE participant_id > 100 ORDER BY participant_name DESC;

SELECT participant_name, feedback_text, rating FROM Participants JOIN Feedback ON Participants.participant_id = Feedback.participant_id WHERE Participants.participant_name LIKE '%John%' AND Feedback.rating > 3 ORDER BY Feedback.rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 AND feedback_text IS NOT NULL ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;

SELECT participant_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM Participants LEFT JOIN Feedback ON Participants.participant_id = Feedback.participant_id GROUP BY Participants.participant_id HAVING total_feedback > 5 ORDER BY total_feedback DESC;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating, MAX(rating) AS max_rating, MIN(rating) AS min_rating FROM Feedback;
SELECT * FROM feedbacks;
SELECT full_name, email FROM participants ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT participant_id, rating, comment FROM feedbacks WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT organization, COUNT(*) as total_feedbacks FROM participants INNER JOIN feedbacks ON participants.participant_id = feedbacks.participant_id GROUP BY organization;
SELECT feedback_id, resolution_status FROM conflict_resolution WHERE resolution_status = 'resolved';
SELECT * FROM feedbacks WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM participants WHERE organization = 'Tech Inc' AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM feedbacks JOIN participants ON feedbacks.participant_id = participants.participant_id WHERE feedbacks.rating < 3;
SELECT feedback_id, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM feedbacks GROUP BY feedback_id HAVING COUNT(participant_id) > 5;
SELECT participant_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM feedbacks GROUP BY participant_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 3;
SELECT * FROM Participants;
SELECT participant_name, participant_role FROM Participants;
SELECT feedback_id, rating FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT participant_name, rating FROM Participants JOIN Ratings ON Participants.participant_id = Ratings.participant_id;
SELECT * FROM Feedback JOIN Participants ON Feedback.participant_id = Participants.participant_id;
SELECT * FROM Participants;
SELECT participant_name, participant_role FROM Participants WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_participants FROM Participants;
SELECT participant_name, rating FROM Participants JOIN Feedback ON Participants.participant_id = Feedback.participant_id;
SELECT participant_name, feedback_text, rating FROM Participants JOIN Feedback ON Participants.participant_id = Feedback.participant_id WHERE Feedback.rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT name, email FROM participants WHERE id = 1;
SELECT rating, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE participant_id = 3;
SELECT resolution_date, description FROM conflict_resolutions ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback JOIN participants ON feedback.participant_id = participants.id WHERE participants.name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM participants ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name FROM participants WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT feedback.id, ratings.rating_value FROM feedback JOIN ratings ON feedback.participant_id = ratings.participant_id;
SELECT participants.name, feedback.rating, feedback.feedback_text FROM participants JOIN feedback ON participants.id = feedback.participant_id WHERE feedback.rating > 4;
SELECT DISTINCT name, email FROM participants WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
